alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:17PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Beaver and northeastern Lipscomb Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Darrouzett, or 16 miles north of Lipscomb, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Follett, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles and Slapout. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
